attributes.review: honestly not a big fan. super popular opinion but trump kinda seems like a choad. ok hear me out, imagine a boy raping 13 year olds, ILLEGAL! now imagine a dude smoking a joint, hot. NOW imagine the dude who raped a girl is president and the guy smoking a joint is in prison. welcome to america. also, terrible app.
attributes.title: Trump

attributes.review: Mr. Trump himself stole my rare hairless bloodhound and let me just tell you I am not a happy camper. This was a prized dog and one I had carefully crafted over 6 generations. Trump came into my house in the middle of the night and took her, I have video evidence.
attributes.title: Stole my hairless dog

attributes.review: Everything keeps freezing. The screen is also so blurry and I have my glasses on so it’s not me

attributes.review: This app is the reason my family unanimously ran into traffic. Will never forgive this app. Wish I could give it zero stars.
attributes.title: This app killed my family

attributes.review: Right when I downloaded this app, I began profusely sharting myself and I haven’t stopped since. Trump brings out the worst in all of us, just like this app made the sharts come out of me✨❤️
attributes.title: honestly repulsive
